thing-type.label: Hue Light Level Sensor
thing-type.description: A sensor providing light level information.

parameter.name: sensorId
parameter.label: Sensor ID
parameter.description: The identifier that is used within the hue bridge.

parameter.name: ledindication
parameter.label: LED Indication
parameter.description: Turns device LED during normal operation on or off. Devices might still indicate exceptional operation (Reset, SW Update, Battery Low).

parameter.name: tholddark
parameter.label: Threshold Dark
parameter.description: Threshold the user configured to be used in rules to determine insufficient light level (ie below threshold). Default value 16000.

parameter.name: tholdoffset
parameter.label: Threshold Offset
parameter.description: Threshold the user configured to be used in rules to determine sufficient light level (ie above threshold). Specified as relative offset to the “dark” threshold. Shall be >=1. Default value 7000.
